page.title: 05Recreation In Bathgate
page.content: Balbardie Park is a place to go to practise sports. As well as having two football pitches, where Bathgate Thistle play, there is also a golf course. In the last two years there have been new things added onto the park. Last year a B.M.X. track was opened and some people from our school had a race to open the track. This year a new running track has been made. As well as all those sports facilities there are also the normal swings and a chute, just as you would expect to find in a park. On top of all that, there is a massive piece of open land with some bushes and trees scattered all over the place. Our school sometimes uses Balbardie Park for things like football and rounders.
